### Neovim version (nvim -v)

v0.8.0-dev-972-g1dcaa75a6

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

No, Vim 9.0.246

### Operating system/version

Arch Linux

### Terminal name/version

kitty 0.25.2

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-kitty

### Installation

build from repo

### How to reproduce the issue

1. Run `nvim --clean`
2. Source the following script:
```vim
func Foo()
  eval 1
endfunc

breakadd expr abs(0)
call Foo()
```

No segfault
